title: Transition-metal ions intercalation chemistry enabled the manganese oxides-based cathode with enhanced capacity and cycle life for high-performance aqueous zinc-ion batteries
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,10191-10198
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA01815J, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Hongyu Zhao, Li Wang, Meiling Li
Here we present a transition-metal ion intercalation chemistry approach to augment Zn2+ (de) intercalation dynamics using copper ions as prototypes. Cu2+ ions serve as mediators for interlayer stabilization and redox centres within the MnO2 host, enhancing capacity and cycling performance.
